Class UdpTransport

java.lang.Object
com.quietterminal.projectneon.core.UdpTransport
All Implemented Interfaces:
Transport, AutoCloseable
public class UdpTransport extends Object implements Transport
UDP implementation of the Transport interface. Uses DatagramChannel for non-blocking I/O support.
Since:
1.1
